storyInfo: With the championship over, everything has returned to normal, including Ch'en's Dossoles 'holiday.' That said, it doesn't seem like she is having a great time.

attributes.content: Don't hurt me, Miss Ch'en. I won't do it again!
attributes.name: Criminal

attributes.content: Your eyes and the hand behind your back tell a different story.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: This looks like a great place to hide your lackeys. You have a bunch of them here, don't you? Get them out.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Hmph, I shouldn't have expected any less from you. Come on out, everybody!
attributes.name: Criminal

attributes.content: Get her!
attributes.name: Criminal

attributes.content: Hold that thought.
Who?
attributes.name: Criminal

attributes.content: Sorry to intrude. Give us a second. Ch'en, what gives? You're in a fight, and you didn't think to call me?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Here you are, anyway.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Heh, Ch'en, I've noticed you've gotten cockier ever since you went to Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Enough. I'll leave you half.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Sure thing.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Grr, it's all of us against you alone, and you still got the upper hand.
attributes.name: Criminal

attributes.content: You put on a show to lure me into fighting you, then you want to ambush me. Why all the hassle for little old me?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: All of us would be making a killing right about now if it wasn't for you, Ch'en.
attributes.name: Criminal

attributes.content: I don't get it, all eyes in the city are on you and Lin right now, and the mayor's got your back. You could have all the fame and fortune you wanted.
attributes.name: Criminal

attributes.content: Why can't you go shoot some commercials and go on your talk shows and leave us alone?!
attributes.name: Criminal

attributes.content: You could be rolling in all the dough, but you have to stop us from making money.
attributes.name: Criminal

attributes.content: This has got nothing to do with you. Now come with me to the police station.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Hah, the police station.
attributes.name: Criminal

attributes.content: The jails at the police stations here have been sitting empty for so long. Guess they will finally get to fill them.
attributes.name: Criminal

attributes.content: I'm not sure if you know this, Ch'en, but as soon as the man I'm working for gives the cops a call, we'll all be out of there before you walk out the front door.
attributes.name: Criminal

attributes.content: You'll remember this lesson I taught you, though.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Yeah, of course I will. How could I ever forget such a badass? Heh.
attributes.name: Criminal

attributes.content: Let it go, Ch'en. There's no talking to these guys. Let's try breaking his hand. That will keep him from giggling.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I won't do that, and don't you dare. Not like I have the authority to stop you, though.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I know the drill, but you don't really think I listened to you just because you were my boss, do you?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Well, I can't break his hand, but I can at least gag him, right?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Hoshiguma ties a rope around the criminal's mouth before giving it a strong pull.
Nnnnnngh—
attributes.name: Criminal

attributes.content: Whatever you want.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Okay, let's take them to the station.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: These men are suspected of destruction of property and attempted to assault me in a premeditated manner. I'll leave them to you.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: What? They'd attack you, Miss Ch'en? P-P-Please, leave them to us! I promise they'll get what's coming for them.
attributes.name: Toady Dossoles Police Officer

attributes.content: Nnnnnnngh!!
attributes.name: Criminal

attributes.content: You can stop winking! Now that you got on Miss Ch'en's bad side, there's nothing the men behind you can do for you.
attributes.name: Toady Dossoles Police Officer

attributes.content: Give them the punishment they deserve. That's all you need to do.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Of course! Anything you say.
attributes.name: Toady Dossoles Police Officer

attributes.content: Hm? What's going on over there?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You know how much work it took to earn that kind of money?!
attributes.name: Contestant

attributes.content: How could you even say that?!
attributes.name: Contestant

attributes.content: And what'll you do about it? I'm in a bad mood today. If you don't want to spend the rest of the week in jail, then scram!
attributes.name: Impatient Dossoles Police Officer

attributes.content: You... *Sigh*!
attributes.name: Contestant

attributes.content: What's the matter?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: M-Miss Ch'en? N-Nothing. This guy's being unreasonable, is all. Haha.
attributes.name: Impatient Dossoles Police Officer

attributes.content: Ch'en?! I'm not being unreasonable. I saved for a whole year just to join this championship. I even won a little money and put it right on my card.
attributes.name: Contestant

attributes.content: Then somebody stole my card while I was walking down the street this morning! That's why I came to the police station to ask for help catching the thief.
attributes.name: Contestant

attributes.content: But as soon as I told him how much I had in the bank, he laughed at me and told me to leave!
attributes.name: Contestant

attributes.content: Is that so?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Yes, uh... No... What I meant was...
attributes.name: Impatient Dossoles Police Officer

attributes.content: Where can I check the surveillance drones' footage?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Huh? Uh... We can watch them right here in the station... It's been a while since we used them, though.
attributes.name: Impatient Dossoles Police Officer

attributes.content: Show me.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Yes, ma'am!
attributes.name: Impatient Dossoles Police Officer

attributes.content: You come too.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: T-Thank you, Miss Ch'en!
attributes.name: Contestant

attributes.content: The room's a little stuffy. Sorry about that.
attributes.name: Impatient Dossoles Police Officer

attributes.content: It's fine. Give me the key. We'll take it from here.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Yes, of course. Uh... If you need me for anything, please don't hesitate to ask.
attributes.name: Impatient Dossoles Police Officer

attributes.content: Well, the equipment here sure looks advanced. More so than anything we have back home.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: But all this clearly isn't getting much use. It's honestly a waste.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: How's the surveillance equipment back at the department? Has it been upgraded yet? I brought it up once before I left.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Nope, but we got the approval, at least. It'll probably take a good while still.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: That's good.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Do you know how to use it?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: It's a Columbian system, so I can at least read it. The authentication, on the other hand... Grr, should've kept the guy here.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Let's give this a try...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Ch'en says and holds her phone up to the authentication terminal. A crisp sound of approval floats out.
Alright, looks like they did give me all the permissions... *Sigh*.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: What's so bad about that? Maybe you should consider getting a job here. These men listen to you. It's got to be a happier place to work.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I'll pass.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Hey, um, I don't understand what you're saying there.
attributes.name: Contestant

attributes.content: Oh, we're both from Lungmen, just chatting away in our language. Don't sweat it.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Okay, you two keep on talking.
attributes.name: Contestant

attributes.content: You seem to have calmed down.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Right. It puts my mind at ease when you are willing to help me. Everyone in the city knows you're not like the cops.
attributes.name: Contestant

attributes.content: With you helping me, I'll be fine even if we don't end up catching the thief.
attributes.name: Contestant

attributes.content: Relax. Ch'en and I have dealt with hundreds of cases like this one, if not thousands.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: When was it stolen? The more details you can give me, the better.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: It was about eleven o'clock, maybe right in the middle of Knox Avenue? That place right in front of the big bar there.
attributes.name: Contestant

attributes.content: Isn't that around where Lin Yühsia's bar is...? You wait outside. I'll look into it for you, but you can't be here seeing all this.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Don't worry. You gave me more than enough details. Even if the cameras didn't get anything, there were probably witnesses.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Okay, thanks for the help.
attributes.name: Contestant

attributes.content: The contestant leaves the control room to wait outside.
Heh, that's just like you, Ch'en. Folks trust you, no matter where you are.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: The local police should be dealing with this.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: It's not so bad to set an example for them, no?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Only if they are willing to learn.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Haha, that's true.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Come help me.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Set the time from 10:00 to 12:00. I'll watch these two feeds. You check the other two.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Sure thing.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: You know, Ch'en?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Maybe I shouldn't say it...
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: You always end up saying it anyway.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Haha. Well, you were absolutely swagger when you talked to those incompetent guys just now.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: This is how I used to talk to everyone back in the department too. It's a force of habit, but you're right. I should fix it.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: No, you're not getting me.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Back home, you knew everyone in the department like the back of your hand, and every time you yelled at someone, you were pushing them to do their jobs.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: But you know what these men are like. You know you can't change them, so everything you're having them do is only superficial.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: That's not the Superintendent Ch'en I knew.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Oh, don't get the wrong idea. I'm trying to say this is a good thing. A really good thing.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Beating around the bush again.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Oh, don't say that. Hey, I see the guy.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: What time?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Okay, let me take a look.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: There we go... lock on. We'll track his movements.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: He's regrouping with his mates. Looks like they're with the local gangs.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: If it isn't Ch'en, the heroine everyone in the city is raving about right now. How can I help you?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: You free?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Hard to say. Maybe. Maybe not.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Help me find somebody.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Ch'en, Hoshiguma, and the contestant head to the place where Lin Yühsia said she would meet up with them.
There, Lin Yühsia is aimlessly fiddling with a card in her hand. Next to her feet lies an unconscious thief, tied up.
Here. This is your card, right?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Yes, yes, yes. That's right. It's mine. Thank you very much, Miss Lin!
attributes.name: Contestant

attributes.content: I owe you one.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Don't worry about it. Just figured I'd lend a hand. Besides, there's nothing you can do for me, even if you owe me one.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Yühsia?! I try on just three outfits and you vanish. Where the hell did you go this time?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I saw an old lady having trouble crossing the street, so I gave her a hand.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: We're on the fifth floor of the mall! How in the world would you spot an old lady?! And the street down there's a pedestrian zone!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I'm giving you five minutes to show up, or you're dead!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Okay.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: You can help me carry Swire's bags.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: I'll pass.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Then I've got no use for you.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: You can deal with this guy. See you.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: See you later.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Well, this I'll never get used to. How are you getting along with Miss Lin, of all people?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: You think I'm getting along with her?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Sure do.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Well, okay.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Take good care of your card. Don't lose it again.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Of course, of course. I really don't know how I can repay you, or Miss Lin. You went through all this trouble for me.
attributes.name: Contestant

attributes.content: Police have to protect the citizens and their interests.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Are you two cops?
attributes.name: Contestant

attributes.content: I used to be... She still is.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I see. I wish the police here were all as honest as you...
attributes.name: Contestant

attributes.content: Even if you're not a cop, as a human being, you should always offer a hand to those in need.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: That's what I used to think as well, but ever since I came to this city, it kind of feels like I had it all wrong...
attributes.name: Contestant

attributes.content: You're not a local?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Nope. I'd say most of the job hoppers here aren't either.
attributes.name: Contestant

attributes.content: My family's from a Singas village.
attributes.name: Contestant

attributes.content: One day, a fight broke out between the Singas and True Bolívarians. Our whole village was destroyed by True Bolívarians. Lots of people died.
attributes.name: Contestant

attributes.content: I was lucky enough to be hunting up in the mountains at the time, and that saved my life. I ran away as soon as I saw what had happened to the village.
attributes.name: Contestant

attributes.content: I wanted to be a soldier, but the army didn't want me. I had no choice. I heard it's easy to make a decent living here, so I came.
attributes.name: Contestant

attributes.content: That must be a painful memory. Sorry for bringing it up.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: To be honest, whenever I think back on it myself, it all feels like a dream.
attributes.name: Contestant

attributes.content: What makes you say that?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I'm 35 now. I spent some 20 years back in my hometown, and it hasn't even been 10 years since I moved here, but sometimes...
attributes.name: Contestant

attributes.content: Sometimes it feels like the life I once had was all a lie.
attributes.name: Contestant

attributes.content: Back then, I thought it was the right thing to do to help out, but when I heard what you said just now, it felt like it's been a really long time since I heard anyone say anything like that. It's been a long time since I even thought that way myself, too.
attributes.name: Contestant

attributes.content: To tell the truth, if the shoe was on the other foot at the police station, if I was a bystander like you instead of someone asking for help, I definitely wouldn't have lent a hand.
attributes.name: Contestant

attributes.content: And I knew it was pointless to go to the cops, but I was pissed. I didn't expect anyone there would help me, but then you showed up.
attributes.name: Contestant

attributes.content: In this city, you can get lots of things done if you have money, but you can forget about it if you don't.
attributes.name: Contestant

attributes.content: And if you want to climb the ladder, your best bet would be to try your luck, join a gang, gamble, or steal. You'd be an idiot to try to get there by working your ass off.
attributes.name: Contestant

attributes.content: The championship is trying your luck?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Of course. I'm a coward. I'm not brave enough to gamble, let alone steal. For someone like me, the championship's the most stable way to hit it big.
attributes.name: Contestant

attributes.content: Men like me don't actually try to win. Just making it through the prelim earns you some decent money. If you win the first round, you get yourself some fame and even more money.
attributes.name: Contestant

attributes.content: I work at a restaurant here. I can talk to the boss and treat you two and Miss Lin to a meal.
attributes.name: Contestant

attributes.content: How about it, Ch'en? Why don't we call Missy too?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Wonderful. I'll head back and tell the boss. I'm sure he'll be over the moon to know Ch'en and Lin will be eating at his restaurant.
attributes.name: Contestant

attributes.content: See you later, then.
attributes.name: Contestant

attributes.content: Yeah.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: What's the matter, Ch'en? Not going to escort him back?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Hoshiguma.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I need you to do me a favor.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Oh? Well, if the sun isn't rising in the west now. Let me say this up front: I have no money. If you need some, try Missy.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Okay, I'll knock it off. What is it? I've known you all these years, and this is the first time I ever heard you ask for something. Just say the word.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Hmph, acting all high and mighty. The mayor's got her back, and she actually thinks she owns the place.
attributes.name: Impatient Dossoles Police Officer

attributes.content: If I had the mayor pulling strings for me, I could throw my weight around too.
attributes.name: Impatient Dossoles Police Officer

attributes.content: Ahem.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Oh, uh... Umm... You're back, Miss Ch'en.
attributes.name: Impatient Dossoles Police Officer

attributes.content: Sure am.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Haha, and that guy behind you must be the thief.
attributes.name: Impatient Dossoles Police Officer

attributes.content: Yeah, I'll leave him to you.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Of course. Not a problem. I'll make sure anyone who dares to upset you gets what they deserve.
attributes.name: Impatient Dossoles Police Officer

attributes.content: Also...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Something else?
attributes.name: Impatient Dossoles Police Officer

attributes.content: I talked to Lady Candela just now, and, uh...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: What Miss Ch'en here is saying is that she knows she stands out too much, and that may have made your office here look bad.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: So she paid Lady Candela a visit and asked her to consider increasing your performance bonuses.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: And out of respect for Miss Ch'en, Lady Candela allocated a decent amount of money. Anyone from the station who has made a meaningful contribution will get a bonus.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: And to help all of you earn the bonus that Lady Candela has set aside, Miss Ch'en will also be holding lectures, teaching your teams the techniques she used back when she was a police officer.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: May I ask... how much is the bonus?
attributes.name: Impatient Dossoles Police Officer

attributes.content: This much for each case.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: With her finger, Hoshiguma draws a number in the air in front of her.
M-Miss Ch'en, you are incredible! I'll go tell everyone right away!
attributes.name: Impatient Dossoles Police Officer

attributes.content: It's nothing...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: And this guy's going on your count.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Thanks! Thank you very much!
attributes.name: Impatient Dossoles Police Officer

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Did that feel bad?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: It certainly didn't feel good.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: But if you ask me, 'What can I do to motivate the police here?' I'd tell you this is the simplest and most direct way to go about it.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: But... this isn't right still.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You're right. It isn't.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: And I can name all kinds of reasons.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: First, you just got here. You may be brimming with charisma, but they still won't bow down to you right away. Just think about how long it took you to get those nitpickers to work with you when you first joined the bureau.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: At times like this, moolah is the simplest way to get someone on board.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: If I remember correctly... I beat them into submission. You were the last one.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I never caved.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Plus, it's a little arrogant to ignore what you've got on hand and rely only on yourself.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: And that's especially if it's money, authority, and power that you have available. You might as well use it.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Is that the impression everyone had of me?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You've put in enough effort over the years to convince everyone in Lungmen. This isn't Lungmen, though, and you aren't planning on staying here that long, so how will you prove yourself?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Next, both of us heard the guy's rambling loud and clear. Do you really think the cops turned out like this because they don't want to do their work?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Were they born this bad? Do they really think it's right for cops to get in bed with gangs, and they are actually happy to release someone as soon as the phone rings?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: This is a police station. They know they're the police.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: It's not that they don't want to stand up to all that. They can't. They're too afraid to. They might've had the courage before, but reality wiped it all out. Trying to reason with them is a futile exercise. Might as well do what you know works.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Those are all reasons, and you should also know you shouldn't have done that.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: But you did, and that's the truth.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: You know, but you don't understand it well enough, Ch'en.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Before, I would probably be worried sick that you were getting yourself killed over something stupid.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: But you've actually changed since you left Lungmen, and, in my eyes, you've changed for the better.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Now, Ironically, I'm afraid you'll lose sight of yourself.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Will I?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Who knows?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: I guess I've said too much. It doesn't matter how afraid I am. This is your decision to make, and I won't interfere.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: And you're sure you won't stand in my way again?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Oh, still holding grudges, huh?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: It's hard to say, though. You know I don't think much of promises.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Heh, Hoshiguma not thinking much of promises. Now that's a new one.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I don't know how to answer yet, Hoshiguma.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Just like how I still have no idea how I'd judge what just happened here and this place itself.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I'm afraid the only thing I can do is keep on walking.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: That will do, Ch'en. That's more than enough.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: What I said might have been scary, but don't forget. You have lots of friends around you. If you come across anything you don't know, there's nothing wrong with asking their help.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Really?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Really.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Okay, then maybe you should give the lecture.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: You're an active duty police officer, I'm not. Besides, didn't you say I should ask my friends for help?
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: I'll be the student this time.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: *Sigh*... If that's your call, how am I supposed to say no?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: But actually, I'm bringing Missy too. I can't be the only one to suffer.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Sure, and feel free to get Lin Yühsia on the stage.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: *Sigh*... There goes my holiday.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Hoshiguma...
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Seriously, the sun here shines way too bright.
attributes.name: Ch'en

attributes.content: It is pretty bright, isn't it? But at least that's the sun, Ch'en.
attributes.name: Hoshiguma

attributes.content: Maybe.
attributes.name: Ch'en
